title: Patient Appointment Scheduling - Successful Booking with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a patient can successfully complete the multi-step appointment form with valid inputs, including selecting visit type, consult type, practice type, health insurance, date, and available time slot.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment scheduling page.
Fill out patient personal information with valid data.
Select valid visit type, consult type, practice type, and health insurance options.
Choose an available date within the allowed 30-day advance window, excluding weekends and holidays.
Select an available 20-minute interval timeslot from the dynamically filtered available times.
Submit the appointment form.
Confirm the appointment is created, patient record is linked or created, and the confirmation page displays correct appointment details.

title: Patient Appointment Scheduling - Form Validations on Invalid Inputs
description: Verify that all client and server-side validations enforce required fields, minimum character lengths, phone number formats, and logical selections, and display appropriate error messages in Spanish.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment scheduling page.
Attempt to submit the form leaving required fields blank.
Client displays Spanish error messages for all missing required fields.
Input invalid phone number format.
Form validation fails with appropriate Spanish error message.
Select inconsistent consult type or practice type not allowed for chosen visit type.
Validation prevents submission with relevant error.
Select a past date, weekend, holiday, or date beyond 30 days in the future.
Date picker disables or prevents selection and shows error message.

title: Dynamic Available Times Management - Verify Time Slot Filtering
description: Test that available 20-minute interval time slots are dynamically generated based on work schedule, existing bookings, and unavailable days/times, excluding blocked or fully booked slots.

steps.description: Request available time slots for a given valid date.
Response returns time slots spaced at 20-minute intervals within doctor’s work hours for that date.
Ensure slots that coincide with existing appointments, unavailable days, or blocked times are excluded.
No overlaps of time slots with already booked appointments or unavailable periods.

title: Secure Appointment Cancellation - Valid Token and Policy Enforcement
description: Verify that appointment cancellation requires a valid token, the token is verified securely, and cancellations within 12 hours prior to appointment are rejected as per policy.

steps.description: Access the cancellation page using a valid cancellation token.
Token is verified successfully and corresponding appointment details are displayed.
Attempt to cancel an appointment more than 12 hours before scheduled time.
Cancellation succeeds and appointment status updates accordingly.
Attempt to cancel an appointment within 12 hours of scheduled time.
System rejects cancellation with appropriate Spanish error message.
Access cancellation page with invalid or expired token.
Access is denied or error message is shown preventing cancellation.

title: Admin Dashboard - Login and Authentication with JWT
description: Verify that admin users can log in using valid credentials, receive a JWT token, and that protected admin routes require the token and reject unauthorized access.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login dialog.
Input valid admin username and password.
Submit login form.
User receives JWT token and is redirected to admin dashboard.
Logout and attempt to access admin dashboard without logging in.
Access is denied and user redirected to login page.
Attempt login with invalid credentials.
Login fails with appropriate error message.

title: Admin Dashboard - Manage Work Schedules and Unavailable Days/Times
description: Verify that the admin can add, update, and delete doctor’s work schedules, mark unavailable days and times, and that these changes affect available appointment slots accordingly.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to work schedule management interface.
Add a new work schedule time frame for a specific date range.
New work schedule is saved and reflected on available times.
Mark specific dates as unavailable (holidays, vacations).
Unavailable dates are blocked from appointments in the scheduling UI.
Block specific time slots within a day as unavailable.
Those times are excluded from available appointment times.
Update and delete work schedule entries.
Changes apply correctly without data integrity issues.

title: Appointment Confirmation Page - Display Accurate Appointment Details
description: Verify that the confirmation page correctly displays all relevant appointment details including visit type, consult/practice type, health insurance, date, time, cancellation link, and policy instructions.

steps.description: Complete an appointment booking.
Navigate to the confirmation page.
Page displays correct patient info, appointment details, cancellation policy, and unique cancellation link.

title: API Rate Limiting - Prevent Abuse while Allowing Legitimate Usage
description: Verify that API endpoints enforce rate limits to prevent misuse, respond with appropriate HTTP status codes when limits are exceeded, and do not impede normal user operations.

steps.description: Send rapid consecutive requests exceeding rate limit threshold to an API endpoint.
Server responds with HTTP 429 Too Many Requests and appropriate error message.
Send regular user requests within limits.
All requests succeed with expected responses and no blocking.

title: Patient Management - CRUD Operations with Phone Validation
description: Verify that patient records can be created, read, updated, and deleted via API with phone number validation enforcing correct format.

steps.description: Create patient record with valid phone number via API.
Patient record created successfully.
Attempt to create/update patient record with invalid phone number format.
Request is rejected with validation error message.
Retrieve patient record by ID.
Patient data returned correctly.
Update patient record information with valid data.
Update succeeds and data is saved.
Delete patient record.
Record is removed successfully.

title: Password Reset Flow for Admin Users
description: Verify that admin users can request password reset via email, receive password reset link, and securely update their password.

steps.description: Navigate to admin password reset request page.
Submit valid admin email for password reset request.
System sends password reset email with secure token link.
Access reset-password page with valid token.
Input and confirm new valid password.
Password is updated, user is notified of success.
Try to access reset-password with invalid/expired token.
Access is denied or error message is shown indicating invalid token.

title: API Error Handling - Verify Proper HTTP Codes and Error Messages
description: Validate that API endpoints respond with correct HTTP status codes and localized error messages in Spanish when invalid requests or server errors occur.

steps.description: Send invalid data in appointment creation API endpoint.
Receive HTTP 400 Bad Request with descriptive Spanish error message.
Access protected API endpoint without valid JWT token.
Receive HTTP 401 Unauthorized with appropriate error message.
Simulate server error (e.g. disconnect DB) and send request.
Receive HTTP 500 Internal Server Error with generic error message; error is logged server-side.
